law.catch_line: Person out on parole not to be required to wear regulation dress of penitentiary.
law.text: No person shall be required to wear the regulation dress of the penitentiary or other thing indicating he is under conviction for a crime while out on parole.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 418, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 18, effective May 18, 1956.
